wiki.summary: 'n crugu bradului is a concept album by the Romanian black metal band Negură Bunget, released on October 3, 2002, through Code666 Records. It is the band's third full-length album overall and is based around the seasons, with each song representing a season. The songs have been given subtitles, though many official releases do not feature these, and most of them that do feature subtitles only feature one set; they are: I - Poartă-a vîntului... (Primăvară) Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: 'n crugu bradului is a concept album by the Romanian black metal band Negură Bunget, released on October 3, 2002, through Code666 Records. It is the band's third full-length album overall and is based around the seasons, with each song representing a season. The songs have been given subtitles, though many official releases do not feature these, and most of them that do feature subtitles only feature one set; they are: I - Poartă-a vîntului... (Primăvară) II - Cătră șipotu dă piatră... (Vară) III - Colo-n jos către apus (Toamnă) IIII - În pădure urlă lupii (Iarnă) The album's Romanian title translates to English as Through the Deepness of the Fir Tree Heights. Meanwhile, the subtitles of the songs translate as follows: I - Wind's Gate... (Spring) II - Towards the Well of Stone... (Summer) III - Down There to the Twilight (Autumn) IIII - Wolves Are Calling in the Forest (Winter) A Chinese reissue of the album by AreaDeath Records features the song "Văzduh" ("Air") as a bonus track, although it does not appear to be a complete recording. A complete version can be found on the Enucleation Records vinyl edition of the band's fourth album Om. Read more on Last.fm.
